subject: Football
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Sixth-ranked Oklahoma can still make the Bowl Championship Series title game, which seemed unlikely two weeks ago after the Sooners, ranked No. 3 at the time, lost at unranked Colorado.
snippet: Sixth-ranked Oklahoma can still make the Bowl Championship Series title game, which seemed unlikely two weeks ago after the Sooners, ranked No. 3 at the time, lost at unranked Colorado.
